event_title: The Best Ways to Rub a Cock

interactivity.requirements: 5 Kaori Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Kadrillionbilliontrillion " Seen " How to Date a Human " from Kaori Kadowaki Seen " The Life of a Blue Whale " from Tsuneyo Tojo Seen " Regularly Scheduled Programming " from Ayane Amamiya

progression.synopsis: Kaori has purchased a new friend, who turns out to be the chicken who " saved " Sensei in the chicken alleyway. Kaori has named him John . Kaori is embarrassed to learn that her terminology for chickens could be subject to misinterpretation.

event_references.event_default_name: The Best Ways to Rub a Cock

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.11.
